verses.verse: He <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H577>"Please,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H1697>wasn't<s%> this what I said when I was still in my own <S%H127>country?<s%> Therefore I <S%H1272>hurried<s%> <S%H6923>to<s%> flee to <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> for I <S%H3045>knew<s%> that you are a <S%H2587>gracious<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> and <S%H7349>merciful,<s%> <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> and you <S%H5162>relent<s%> of doing <S%H7451>harm.<s%>
Therefore <S%H3068>now,<s%> Yahweh, <S%H3947>take,<s%> I beg <S%H5315>you,<s%> my life from <S%H2896>me;<s%> for it is better for me to <S%H4194>die<s%> than to <S%H2416>live.<s%>"

Then <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> on the east <S%H6924>side<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and there <S%H6213>made<s%> himself a <S%H5521>booth,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> under it in the <S%H6738>shade,<s%> until he might <S%H7200>see<s%> what would become of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4487>prepared<s%> a <S%H7021>vine,<s%> and made it to come <S%H5927>up<s%> over <S%H3124>Jonah,<s%> that it might be a <S%H6738>shade<s%> over his <S%H7218>head,<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> him from his <S%H7451>discomfort.<s%> So <S%H3124>he<s%> was <S%H1419>exceedingly<s%> <S%H8055>glad<s%> because of the <S%H7021>vine.<s%>

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4487>prepared<s%> a <S%H8438>worm<s%> <S%H5927>at<s%> <S%H7837>dawn<s%> the next <S%H4283>day,<s%> and it <S%H5221>chewed<s%> on the <S%H7021>vine,<s%> so that it <S%H3001>withered.<s%>

It <S%H8121>happened,<s%> when the sun <S%H2224>arose,<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4487>prepared<s%> a <S%H2759>sultry<s%> <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind;<s%> and the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H5221>beat<s%> on <S%H3124>Jonah<s%>'s <S%H7218>head,<s%> so that he <S%H5968>fainted,<s%> and <S%H7592>requested<s%> for <S%H5315>himself<s%> that he might <S%H4191>die,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is <S%H2896>better<s%> for me to <S%H4194>die<s%> than to <S%H2416>live.<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3124>Jonah,<s%> "Is it <S%H3190>right<s%> for you to be <S%H2734>angry<s%> about the <S%H7021>vine?<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am <S%H3190>right<s%> to be <S%H2734>angry,<s%> even to <S%H4194>death.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "You have been <S%H2347>concerned<s%> for the <S%H7021>vine,<s%> for which you have not <S%H5998>labored,<s%> neither made it <S%H1431>grow;<s%> which came up in a <S%H1121>night,<s%> and <S%H6>perished<s%> in a <S%H1121>night.<s%>

<S%H2347>Shouldn't<s%> I be concerned for <S%H5210>Nineveh,<s%> that <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> in which <S%H3426>are<s%> <S%H7235>more<s%> than one hundred <S%H8147>twenty<s%> <S%H7239>thousand<s%> <S%H120>persons<s%> who <S%H3045>can't<s%> discern between their right <S%H3225>hand<s%> and their left <S%H8040>hand;<s%> and also <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H929>livestock?<s%>"
